title: Polteageist
snippet: Polteageist - The Black Tea Pokémon. Found in antique teapots. Gen8 Scarlet & Violet entry.

title: Pikachu
snippet: Pikachu - The Mouse Pokémon. Electric-type. Classic series mascot.

title: Charizard
snippet: Charizard - The Flame Pokémon. Fire/Flying. Strong in many games.
